What courses are offered?.answer: The college offers B.Tech (CSE, ECE, Mechanical, Civil, Electrical), MBA, MCA and B.Sc programs (PCM, PCB). All programs are NAAC accredited and designed to meet industry standards.

How can I apply for admission?.answer: Visit our website www.collegewala.edu and fill the online application form. Attach required documents (12th marks, ID proof, address proof) and submit the application fee. Check the admissions portal for merit list announcements.

Is hostel facility available?.answer: Yes, separate hostels for boys and girls with WiFi, laundry, 24/7 water, common rooms, security guards. Each room has study table and attached bathroom. Hostel fee: Rs. 50,000-75,000/year.

What is the placement rate?.answer: Placement rate exceeds 95% with average package of 8 LPA and highest at 25 LPA. Top recruiters: TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Google, Amazon, Microsoft, Cognizant, Accenture, and various startups.

What is the fee structure?.answer: B.Tech: Rs. 2.5 lakhs/year. MBA: Rs. 4 lakhs/year. MCA: Rs. 3 lakhs/year. B.Sc: Rs. 1.5 lakhs/year. Hostel: Rs. 50,000-75,000/year. Scholarships available for merit and needy students.

Are there scholarships available?.answer: Yes, merit scholarships (10-50% tuition waiver), need-based financial aid, SC/ST scholarships (100% waiver), minority scholarships, sports scholarships. Apply before Dec 31 through Financial Aid Office.

What are the library facilities?.answer: 50,000+ books, 100+ digital journals, e-books, research papers, online databases (JSTOR, IEEE Xplore, Google Scholar). Open 24/7 during semester with computer lab and quiet study areas.

Are there sports facilities on campus?.answer: Yes, state-of-the-art facilities: cricket ground, football field, basketball/badminton/tennis courts, swimming pool, gym with modern equipment, table tennis, indoor sports facility.

What are the eligibility criteria for ad.answer: B.Tech: 12th pass with PCM (50% aggregate) and JEE Main score. MBA: Bachelor's with 50% marks and CAT/MAT score. MCA: B.Sc/B.Tech with 50% marks. B.Sc: 12th pass with Science.

Can I pursue internships during my cours.answer: Yes, internships are integrated into curriculum. Summer (May-July) and semester internships available. Partners: Google, Microsoft, Amazon, startups. Final year projects can be done as internships.

What are the cut-off marks for admission.answer: B.Tech general: 70-85%, reserved: 50-65% (varies yearly). MBA: CAT 90+ percentile. Check our admissions portal for latest cutoffs and merit list.

Is there campus life and extracurricular.answer: Yes, active clubs: Sports, Cultural, Tech, Debate, Photography, NSS, Literary. Annual fest, cultural programs, tech competitions, sports tournaments, hackathons organized year-round.

What is the faculty-to-student ratio?.answer: Faculty-to-student ratio is 1:12 for personalized attention. All faculty hold PhD from top universities with 10+ years average experience. Regular industry interactions and research publications.

Are there research opportunities?.answer: Yes, well-equipped labs and research centers in AI, ML, IoT, Renewable Energy. Faculty supervise thesis and research papers. Opportunities for patent filing and conference presentations.

What is the alumni network?.answer: 20,000+ alumni working globally. Active alumni association organizing networking events, seminars, mentorship. Alumni mentor current students for career development.

Where is the college located?.answer: Located in Yelahanka New Town, Bangalore (13.1845°N, 77.5937°E). Main entrance on Jala Hobli Road. Easily accessible by public transport, metro, and buses. Spread over 25 acres.

What is the college contact information?.answer: Main: +91-80-6751-2345. Admissions: +91-80-6751-2100. Email: admissions@collegewala.edu. Fax: +91-80-6751-2200. Office hours: 9 AM-5 PM Mon-Fri. Emergency: 24/7.

What is the admission timeline?.answer: Applications open: June 1. Last date: July 31. Merit list: Within 2 weeks of closure. Document verification: August. Classes start: August 15. Offline registrations available year-round.

Does the college provide campus placemen.answer: Yes, dedicated Training and Placement cell ensures 95%+ placements. Resume building, interview coaching, mock tests, aptitude training provided. Off-campus opportunities also facilitated.

What is the hostel safety policy?.answer: 24/7 security with guards at all entry points. CCTV surveillance throughout hostel. Emergency medical team on campus. Regular health check-ups. In-out register maintained. Safety drills conducted quarterly.

Are there any industry collaborations?.answer: Yes, partnerships with TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Google, Microsoft, Amazon, IBM, Accenture. Joint research projects, guest lectures, internship opportunities, and collaborative research centers.
